page.title: 15Ponies in Uyeasound.
page.content: Years ago there were horses in Shetland but the horse ate so much grass that there was not enough grass for them.The Shetland ponies were so small that they did not eat much grass.Their coats grew thick to keep them warm. Crofters and farmers keep Shetland ponies for their enjoyment.Little profit can be made from their sale. I have two Shetland ponies.One of my them is called Kizzy and the other is called Shandy.Kizzy is chestnut and Shandy is brown and white.I keep them in a field.I put water in a baby's bath.They need water every day.I try to groom them every day in Summer too.Kizzy is five years old and Shandy is three years old.
